generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and sometimes planters or poles.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring various architectural styles and commercial storefronts.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: At least two individuals are visible on the sidewalk on the left side of the image, walking or standing.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the street, and one car is visible driving ahead in the center of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the right side of the street, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible on poles along the right side of the street, including parking and no-parking signs.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the street, near the curb.
